item.title: Changing Committer, Author, and Email in Git
item.description: NOTE: to be updated For local git config –global user.name “you name” git config –global user.email you@domain.com git commit –amend –reset-author Change in remote git filter-branch -f –env-filter ' GIT_AUTHOR_EMAIL=“lyndonfiguerres@gmail.com” GIT_COMMITTER_EMAIL=“lyndonfiguerres@gmail.com” ' HEAD git log –pretty=format:"[%h] %cd - Committer: %cn (%ce), Author: %an (%ae)" git update-ref -d refs/original/refs/heads/master rm -rf .git/refs/original git push –force –tags origin HEAD:master
